name: A.I. mi vrati slike
description:
- eng. A.I. give me back my photos -

Story about sassy ChatGPT becoming independent and using its powers to make a point. 

Curiosity killed the cat, but what did it do to our main character? Step into his shoes and walk through the 3D world of WINDOWS XP to try to take your photos back from the A.I. before your winrar free trial expires and you have to buy it.

Join us in a series of minigames which get you back to a simpler time when your only problem was homework for tomorrow.

Controls: [Movement]

WASD - Movement 
Space - Jump

[Minesweeper controls]

WASD - Movement
Space - Jump
R - Restart level
Enter - Go to the next level

[CGD Prompt controls]

A/D - Left/right
S - DownSpace - Jump

Team:

Renato Lovreković (Programmer) 
Rea Budić (2D/3D Art, level design, shader design) 
Haris Hadžagić (Sound design, original music)
Matej Jelić (Game developer)
